articles.description: The parents should pay for the car.
articles.content:
Sometimes, plans to teach responsibility can backfire.
So, what would you do if your parents told you that, while they wanted you to drive, you’d need to pay for half of the costs?
Would you accept… [+2193 chars]

articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Research of Galaxies Supports Einstein’s General Theory of Relativity - VOA Learning English
articles.description: International researchers using observations by an instrument in Arizona have found evidence supporting the general theory of relativity. The findings show that galaxies affected by the universe’s expansion behave in ways predicted by the theory.
articles.content:
An international group of scientists has been studying how the structure of the universe has grown over the past 11 billion years.
These researchers recently announced findings about how gravity beh… [+4516 chars]
